title: Addiction
description: New York Times Bestselling Author of Ugly and Mistrust.Meth, crank, ice, glass, fire, tina, chalk, crystal or crystal meth.Whatever you call it, it's the same thing. Addictive.Drugs ruin people's lives.I should know, they destroyed mine.I'm Hannah and I got hooked on ice. What started as a trickle, ended with a tsunami washing everything away; my family, my life.I'm not sure you're ready to read my story; it's real and confronting.Open the book, read the pages and see how easy it is for anyone to get addicted.Ice affects all types of people. It doesn't discriminate.It will SCREW. YOU. UP.*Drug abuse, physical abuse, emotional abuse and emotional conditioning. Recommended for 16+ Contains distressing content. It will cause you anger, frustration and you'll want to hurt some characters.
author: Margaret McHeyzer
